entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon then light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
